section.heading: Nature of proceeding.
section.text: *NOTE: This codification is not the most current. To see the current law, click this link Current Version*

para.text: Upon request for abbreviated probate contained in a petition for probate, the Register of Wills:
May admit a will to probate; and
Shall appoint one or more personal representatives based on the statements contained in the petition for probate.
The Register of Wills may require additional verified proof, which shall be filed in the proceeding.
The finality of abbreviated probate shall be governed by § 20-331.

annotations.annotation: Application of Law 10-241: See Application of Law 10-241 and Emergency act amendment notes to § 20-304.
